title: Riot Squad Singed
body: Dear Rito, please for the love of god make it possible to obtain more than the skins currently obtainable in hextech crafting. Signed was my first main. You could call me filth, a piece of crap, whatever but ever since 2012 when I first started playing league. I've looked at that skin. I have wanted that skin for ages. I would KILL for that skin. I have snowsay singed. Mad scientist singed. I NEED Riot Singed. I dont care if you make it a 0.000001% chance of drop. I will stay hard working to get that skin! Please Rito. Make more skins obtainable in hextech crafting. I would do anything!

replies.body: Unfortunately, we don't have plans to make this skin available. :c

good!
i think skins should reflect the passage of time. 
I personally think its great when people have skins that you don't see too often!
I feel there should be more of that!
i also believe that it is special when some veterans have skins like UFO Corky. Skins that can not be obtained by monetary means!
Way back i disagreed with the move of making all the legacy and special edition skins available again, even though it sure was a great business strat.
I am glad that some skins are not being reissued!

I actually played a game with a UFO Corki this morning, fully you should mention him. :P It was pretty sweet to see an old school skin being used! 

We feel that some skins, particularly those earned via ranked (Victorious), or skins like King Rammus (awarded to players who participated in Closed Beta) mark special achievements, and should only be owned by players who participated at the time.

That said, as a whole, we believe skins are primarily about self-expression and fun, which is why we did move the seasonal skins to legacy, as opposed to limited.

IF there ever is a point where there are no players using a limited skin say king rammas because they have all stopped playing, would the king rammas skin become available to say the remaining season 1 players?
Super hard to say, it's not something we're really discussed, so I don't know what that decision/resolution would be/look like.
